00051 struct null_type;
00052 
00065 template<int N, class T>
00066   struct tuple_element
00067 {
00068   private:
00069     typedef typename T::tail_type Next;
00070 
00071   public:
00074     typedef typename tuple_element<N-1, Next>::type type;
00075 }; // end tuple_element
00076 
00085 template<class T>
00086   struct tuple_size
00087 {
00090   static const int value = 1 + tuple_size<typename T::tail_type>::value;
00091 }; // end tuple_size

00121                   typename tuple_element<N, detail::cons<HT, TT> >::type
00122                 >::non_const_type
00123 get(detail::cons<HT, TT>& t);

00361   tuple(const detail::cons<U1, U2>& p) : inherited(p) {}

00363   template <class U1, class U2>
00364   inline __host__ __device__ 
00365   tuple& operator=(const detail::cons<U1, U2>& k)
00366   {
00367     inherited::operator=(k);
00368     return *this;
00369   }
00370 
00377   template <class U1, class U2>
00378   __host__ __device__ inline
00379   tuple& operator=(const thrust::pair<U1, U2>& k) {
00380     //BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(length<tuple>::value == 2);// check_length = 2
00381     this->head = k.first;
00382     this->tail.head = k.second;
00383     return *this;
00384   }

00391   void swap(tuple &t)
